newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: FORECAST - Bank/Portugal to leave rates unchanged.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Bank/Portugal to leave rates unchanged.

text.p: Seven out of eight analysts polled by Reuters on Thursday expected the Bank of Portugal to leave its repurchase pact rate unchanged at 6.30 percent when it announces new money market conditions on Friday.
All eight analysts saw the Bank keeping its drain, or absorption rate at 5.80 percent. The drain rate is the rate at which the Bank absorbs excess funds.
The only analyst to forecast a cut in the repo saw the Bank shaving 20 basis points off the rate when it announces new terms at 1315 GMT.

The following banks and brokers took part in the poll and were prepared to be identified: Banco Finantia, Banco Portugues de Investimento, Banco Mello de Investimentos, Banco de Comercio e Industria, IMF-Informacao de Mercados Financeiros, Siemca-Sociedade Mediadora de Capitais, Fincor.
